participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

DOT_05.Description: Mean accuracy on all neutral threat (NT) trials

DOT_06.Description: Mean accuracy on all neutral happy (NH) trials

DOT_07.Description: Mean accuracy on all neutral neutral (NN) trials

DOT_09.Description: Mean RT on neutral NT trials

DOT_10.Description: Mean RT on neutral NH trials

DOT_11.Description: Mean RT on threat NT trials

DOT_12.Description: Mean RT on happy NH trials

DOT_13.Description: Mean RT on all NT trials

DOT_14.Description: Mean RT on all NH trials

DOT_15.Description: Mean RT on all NN trials

DOT_16.Description: Threat bias score (mean of neutral NT trials minus mean of threat NT trials)

DOT_17.Description: Happy bias score (mean of neutral NT trials minus mean of happy NT trials)
